name: firestore-backup-restore
description: Google Firebase Firestore backup and restore tool
author: Will Lawrence <will.lawrence@gmail.com>

scripts.test-debug:
node --inspect-brk node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand; echo '
  To debug, set debugger; statement, open chrome://inspect and click on Open Dedicated DevTools for Node and your running instance. 
  - More info @ https://facebook.github.io/jest/docs/en/troubleshooting.html#tests-are-failing-and-you-don-t-know-why'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

dependenciesComments.@google-cloud/firestore: FIXME - Can be removed once next version after 0.11.2 is released which exposes all the Firestore types so instanceof can be used
